sections.heading: “Person” Defined.Section 28.72 - State Arson Strike Force; Creation; Personnel; Powers.
sections.text:
As used in this act:

(a) "Person" means a natural person, partnership, cooperative, association, private or public corporation, personal representative, receiver, trustee, assignee, or other legal entity.

History:1978, Act 170, Imd. Eff. May 27, 1978

sections.heading: State Arson Strike Force; Creation; Personnel; Powers.
sections.text:
(1) A state arson strike force unit is created within the department of state police to be comprised of personnel assigned by the director of the department of state police.

(2) The strike force unit is authorized to investigate each case involving a conspiracy to commit arson, a fire which was perpetrated to defraud a person, or any other fire which may involve the act of arson.

History:1978, Act 170, Imd. Eff. May 27, 1978 ;-- 2006, Act 191, Imd. Eff. June 19, 2006
